settings.name: PRO Levitate Chamois
settings.title: PRO Levitate Chamois
settings.description:
The pinnacle of comfort and performance, this chamois pad offers more support with better stretch and breathability than any on the market. The PRO Next-Gen Suspension Core® uses ultra-high-density layers to distribute your body weight over a larger area for more comfort, even deep into a ride when most chamois are packed out. It features our softest, highest stretch 1:1 Boundary Layer that moves with you in and out of the saddle to minimize friction. Whether you’re riding for one hour or twelve, nothing rides better.

LEVITATE CHAMOIS SERIES

The Levitate family represents our latest innovation in chamois technology. By combining a multi-density Suspension Core™, super-soft 1:1® Boundary Layer top sheet, and seamless Infinite Edge™ transition, the Levitate lets you float through road and trail chatter so you’ll never bottom out.

REDUCE FRICTION: Cycling is repetitive, so we use high stretch materials, soft face fabrics, and an innovative floating top layer to smooth the movement between your body and the saddle.

PROVIDE SUPPORT: While riding, a considerable amount of weight is concentrated on the sit bones, which are about the size of a quarter. Our suspension core design distributes this pressure evenly across a wider area to prevent hot spots and improve long-distance comfort.

KEEP SKIN DRY: We choose specialized, highly breathable layers to allow moisture to move freely away from your body, maintaining skin health and a chafe-free riding experience.

settings.title: ELITE Levitate Chamois
settings.description:

settings.name: SELECT Levitate Chamois
settings.title: SELECT Levitate Chamois
settings.description:
Based on the same design philosophy as the more premium PRO and ELITE, this chamois pad delivers incredible performance at a more accessible price point. The key difference is that it’s cut from a single layer of medium-density material, with a thicker cross-section providing comfortable support to the most high-pressure areas. An integrated boundary layer keeps soft, fast-drying fabric next to the skin to minimize friction. This chamois punches above its weight, delivering a ride on par with most mid-range offerings.

settings.name: Pedal to Zero
settings.title: Pedal to Zero
settings.description: We calculated the Pedal to Zero number using the EPA’s estimate that a typical passenger car produces 404 grams of CO2 per mile. For example, our Rove Short creates the equivalent of 9.8kg of CO2*. Therefore, if you ride 24 miles instead of driving, you’ve zeroed out the emissions impact of the Rove Short. This knowledge can inspire us to change our behavior. *This information was calculated by PEARL iZUMi using the Higg Product Module 2.0 at Higg.org. It includes cradle-to-gate impacts only.

settings.name: In-R-Cool Infrared
settings.title: In-R-Cool Infrared
settings.description: In-R-Cool Infrared technology utilizes advanced fabric construction and design to enhance the cooling effect for riders during intense activities. It features infrared-reflective yarns embedded into the fabric. This method reflects the sun's rays, effectively reducing the fabric's surface temperature, thus keeping the rider cooler in hot conditions. Additionally, this technology helps in managing moisture and promoting quick drying, enhancing comfort and performance.

settings.name: In-R-Cool Sweat Activated
settings.title: In-R-Cool Sweat Activated
settings.description: In-R-Cool technology helps keep you in the comfort zone when the mercury rises so that you can perform better in hot conditions. In-R-Cool boosts the natural cooling properties of our technical Transfer fabrics beyond simple sweat evaporation without changing the look or texture.

settings.name: PI Dry®
settings.title: PI Dry®
settings.description: PI Dry® is a proprietary technology developed to enhance the performance and comfort of cycling gear. This technology provides a permanent water-shedding treatment that is applied to fabrics at the fiber level, making them resistant to saturation from rain or road spray. Unlike other treatments that can wash out over time, PI Dry® ensures that each fiber is coated with a hydrophobic treatment before the fabric is woven or knit, ensuring that the performance is built to last, not just seasonally but for the life of the garment. This feature is ideal for all-weather conditions, enabling riders to stay dry and comfortable in various climates, ultimately enhancing their riding experience and performance.

settings.name: Polartec® Neoshell®
settings.title: Polartec® Neoshell®
settings.description: Polartec® Neoshell® is a revolutionary fabric technology that provides an exceptional combination of waterproof and breathable performance. This cutting-edge material is designed for the most demanding environments, offering cyclists and other athletes unparalleled protection against the elements while maintaining a high level of air permeability. This means that while it blocks out water and wind, it also allows sweat vapor to escape, keeping the wearer dry and comfortable during intense activities. The unique construction of Neoshell® enhances the wearer's thermoregulation, making it an ideal choice for activities that demand rigorous movement and exposure to harsh weather conditions.

settings.name: AmFIB® Lite Softshell
settings.title: AmFIB® Lite Softshell
settings.description: AmFIB® Lite Softshell is a high-performance fabric technology designed for ultimate lightweight flexibility and protection. This innovative softshell material strikes an excellent balance between warmth and breathability, making it ideal for cold-weather cycling without the bulk typically associated with winter gear. Its soft, stretchable qualities ensure a comfortable, form-fitting wear, while its water-resistant properties help keep the elements at bay. AmFIB® Lite Softshell is perfect for riders who demand high mobility and weather protection in their cycling apparel.

settings.name: AmFIB® Thermal Softshell
settings.title: AmFIB® Thermal Softshell
settings.description: The AmFIB® Thermal Softshell is a cutting-edge fabric technology designed to optimize comfort and performance in cold-weather cycling conditions. The fabric combines a thermal fleece on the inside for warmth with a weather-resistant softshell exterior that blocks wind and repels water, ensuring riders stay dry and comfortable. AmFIB® is engineered for durability and flexibility, allowing for a full range of motion while maintaining breathability. This makes it ideal for cyclists who refuse to let the harsher conditions of winter stop their riding adventures.

settings.name: Polartec® Alpha® Direct
settings.title: Polartec® Alpha® Direct
settings.description: Polartec® Alpha® Direct is an advanced insulation technology designed for versatility and performance in outdoor apparel. This innovative material is specifically engineered to provide superior warmth and breathability, making it ideal for activities that involve fluctuating temperatures. Unlike traditional insulation, Polartec® Alpha® Direct is designed to be used without the need for a separate liner, allowing it to be in direct contact with other layers or the skin, which enhances moisture vapor transmission and reduces overall garment weight. This results in a more comfortable and adaptable garment that excels in a variety of weather conditions, making it perfect for cyclists and outdoor enthusiasts who require functional, adaptable, and lightweight apparel.

settings.name: PrimaLoft® Gold
settings.title: PrimaLoft® Gold
settings.description: PrimaLoft® Gold is the premier microfiber insulation material renowned for its lightweight yet robust heat retention capabilities. It delivers outstanding warmth without the bulk, mimicking the warmth and compressibility of down while providing superior wet-weather performance. PrimaLoft® Gold is highly breathable, packable, and exceptionally soft, making it the preferred choice for premium outerwear, gloves, and sleeping bags where maintaining warmth in damp conditions is crucial. Its ultra-fine fibers form tiny air pockets that trap body heat and keep the cold out, ensuring optimal thermal efficiency even when wet. This insulation is also environmentally conscious, often made with post-consumer recycled materials, further enhancing its appeal to those prioritizing sustainability alongside performance.

settings.name: WxB 2.5L Membrane
settings.title: WxB 2.5L Membrane
settings.description: The WxB 2.5L Membrane is a high-performance fabric technology designed to enhance the rider's experience in adverse weather conditions. This innovative membrane consists of 2.5 layers that offer superior waterproof and breathable properties, ensuring riders stay dry and comfortable. The outer layer is treated with a Durable Water Repellent (DWR) finish to repel water, while the middle layer incorporates a breathable waterproof membrane that blocks moisture from entering and allows sweat vapor to escape. This technology is crucial for maintaining optimal comfort and protection during rainy or wet conditions, making it ideal for dedicated cyclists who ride regardless of the weather.

settings.name: WxB 3L Membrane
settings.title: WxB 3L Membrane
settings.description: The WxB 3L Membrane is a high-performance material designed to provide exceptional weather protection and breathability for cyclists. This three-layer membrane is designed to be waterproof, breathable, and windproof, providing ultimate protection against the elements. The outer layer repels water and blocks wind, while the middle membrane allows vapor to escape, ensuring that moisture does not accumulate inside the garment. This functionality not only keeps the rider dry from external moisture but also prevents overheating and sweat buildup, making it ideal for challenging weather conditions.

settings.name: GoFresh
settings.title: GoFresh
settings.description: GoFresh anti-microbial technology is a cutting-edge feature integrated into their cycling apparel to enhance rider comfort and hygiene. This technology uses anti-microbial agents embedded within the fabric to combat odor-causing bacteria, ensuring the garments remain fresh and odor-free, even after extensive use. The incorporation of GoFresh technology not only helps maintain the apparel's cleanliness and smell but also extends the wearability of the garments between washes, making it ideal for cyclists who face long hours on the road and varied environmental conditions.

settings.name: D3O® Ghost™
settings.title: D3O® Ghost™
settings.description: D3O® Ghost™ is an innovative material technology specifically designed for cyclists who seek the ultimate balance between protection and comfort. This cutting-edge material is exceptionally lightweight and flexible, making it almost imperceptible when worn, yet provides robust impact protection that hardens on impact. The D3O® Ghost™ technology is engineered to absorb and distribute energy during a crash, significantly reducing the risk of injury.

settings.name: D3O® 3D Molded
settings.title: D3O® 3D Molded
settings.description: D3O® 3D Molded is a cutting-edge material technology. This technology integrates 3D molding processes with D3O®'s patented shock-absorbing materials to enhance rider safety and comfort. The resulting products offer superior protection without compromising on flexibility or comfort, making it ideal for dynamic and challenging cycling environments. D3O® 3D Molded pads are strategically placed in high-impact areas to absorb shocks and reduce the risk of injuries, ensuring that riders can tackle any trail or road with confidence and security.

settings.name: D3O® Sheet
settings.title: D3O® Sheet
settings.description: The D3O® Sheet technology is a cutting-edge material designed for high-performance impact protection. This lightweight, flexible sheet incorporates D3O®'s unique patented technology, which allows it to remain soft and flexible under normal conditions but instantly stiffens upon impact to absorb and disperse energy. This characteristic makes it ideal for cycling, where both comfort and protection are paramount. D3O® enhances rider safety without compromising on freedom of movement, ensuring that cyclists can enjoy their rides with an added layer of security against potential impacts.

settings.name: D3O® Thin Sheet
settings.title: D3O® Thin Sheet
settings.description: The D3O® Thin Sheet technology represents a sophisticated approach to impact protection. This material is crafted from a unique polymer composite that behaves differently under various forces: it flows freely under normal conditions for comfort and flexibility but locks together upon impact to absorb and disperse energy. This dual nature provides superior protection without adding significant bulk or restricting the freedom of movement, making it ideal for cycling where performance and safety are paramount.
